comment: Pretty cheap and basic scotch. Nothing really wrong with it but nothing stands out about this bottle to me
Color: rich gold, Nose: hint of honey and vanilla, Taste: no napalm, vanilla, smooth
Spicy, almost like a rye. Not as well balanced as the Founder's Reserve.
Quite a different touch with the cognac finish. Good value for the money!
Like every the glenlivit this one is tastefull too
I’m agree with HAM-KUN and LEWIS-CLARKEZ on this one. Nice review guys 🥴👍🏼

In the same category price as a lot of 12 year old scotches makes this a difficult one to rate there are a lot I would rather own but this is worth tasting as it is unique raisins nutty sweet white dessert wine I guess is the cognac finish very smooth
It's ok, sweet and easy but not much happening.
sweet with an alcohol like aftertaste
rough sweetness, not rounded, no peat, lacking finesse

Subtle flavour and smooth light texture is instantly noticeable, from the addition of the cognac I’d assume. As it sits on the palette, flavours begin to dance, reminding you why this release is so special.
Very smooth and easy to drink. The cognac is very evident when you smell the whisky as is some sweetness.
Smooth and Sweet. Follow's in the path of other good Glevlivets. Was pleasantly surprised by the honey taste.

This is a great scotch, I always felt the 15 was missing something and a little boring. The captains reserve has that missing element. It is just as smooth but the flavour is more pronounced and that cognac finish rounds it out. Both regularly around $70CAD but can be had on sale for $20 less, I will always pick the captain going forward.

The Glenlivet Triple Cask Matured Distillers Reserve
향 : 알콜, 거의 없음, 가벼운 프루티
맛 : 가벼움, 프루티, 스파이시, 플로랄, 견과류
피니쉬 : 가벼움, 약간의 포도, 달콤쌉쌀
Buttery, raisins. Dusty on the nose

Nose: Port and plum

Flavour: first a light alcohol hit, then some sweet-sour flavours with a hint of cognac 

Finish: slight aftertaste of honey

Nice go-to whisky. Easy going.

★★★★
Beau, bon pas cher!
Une belle surprise en cette soirée festive de tempête hivernale. Quand j'ai mis mon nez au-dessus de ce verre, je me suis immédiatement imaginé une bouteille de plus de 100$. Mais à moins de 70$, ce scotch mielleux devrait faire partie de ma réserve sous peu. Le seul hic, non disponible en ligne!
Nice raisin notes, toffee and caramel.
